nodes.text: Melenna Seltrayne was a female Human who served as a member of the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War. She grew up on the streets of Ord Mantell, and was recruited into the Alliance following a botched attempt to pickpocket Koris Haslam. Joining Haslam's group of commandos, Melenna went on several missions for the Alliance, including the rescue of Gebnerret Vibrion from the Imperial prison on Selnesh. Despite being in plain sight during a stormtrooper ambush, she escaped the prison with her teammates and Vibrion without suffering any injuries, prompting Barsoulentinial Enkhet to claim that she was the group's luck.
